ygData.subject: Re: New
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi Danielle and welcome to EQ! I hope you will have a good time and enjoy the game along with trying to figure out why hubby is addicted! LOL Actually I like
ygData.messageBody:
Hi Danielle and welcome to EQ! I hope you will have a good time and
enjoy the game along with trying to figure out why hubby is addicted!
LOL Actually I like to think of the "addiction" caused by EQ is one like
an "on-going vacation" It's always something new, challenging, the
possibilities are almost endless. There are so many places to go and
see, and real people to meet and not just computer created people
although there are those too, (called NPC's) that you do need to talk
to. You can meet others from all over the world from the safety and
comfort of your house. Plus the growth and development of your character
is like watching a child grow. Before you know it, you'll be addicted!

Happy adventureing!

EverQuest@yahoogroups.com wrote:

> Message: 1
> Date: Sat, 28 Aug 2004 23:45:35 -0000
> From: "danielleheier" <danielleheier@...>
> Subject: New
>
> Hi,
>
> I'm Danielle and I'm quite new with EverQuest. It is my husband
> indeed who kind of made me interested in the game on the internet as
> he is very good at it and can play hours (when I say hours I mean
> LOTS of hours!!!) in a row!! I saw him playing a straight 24 hours
> recently.... :) So hopefully this group will help me understand the
> addiction it does create!! :)
>
> Thank you!!
>
> Danielle
>
